decks.notes: The main concept of this Golgari Aggro deck is to aggressively overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and disruptive spells. The deck aims to control the board by using Liliana of the Veil and Reckoner Bankbuster to deal with threats, while also disrupting the opponent's hand with Invoke Despair. It then uses cards like Bushwhack and Glissa Sunslayer to boost the power of creatures and push for quick damage. Key creatures in the deck include Phyrexian Obliterator, Evolved Sleeper, and Graveyard Trespasser, which can quickly swing the game in the player's favor. The deck also includes lands like Boseiju, Who Endures and Takenuma, Abandoned Mire to enhance spellcasting.
